channel.title: Engine Error
channel.description:
I'm getting an Engine Error at map [b]bm_c3a2d[/b], at the position: [b]setpos 635.233826 -1704.595215 984.031250;setang 9.140625 172.584229 0.000000[/b]:
Too manu verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (43060>32768) Tell a programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE.
